mean_cn: adj. 体贴的，考虑周到的
mean_en: thinking about the rights and feelings of other people :showing kindness toward other people
word_etyma: consider考虑 + ate形容词后缀：可…的 → considerate 可考虑的，考虑周到的
sentence: As a considerate boyfriend, he took good care of her when she was ill.
sentence_trans: 作为一个体贴的男朋友，他在她生病时无微不至地照顾她。
